document.full_text: in an epic final, novak djokovic defeated world number one rafa nadal in a third set tiebreak to win the sony ericsson open 4-6 6-3 7-6 on sunday.
document.title: djokovic sinks nadal in thrilling miami final
lines_and_colors: in an epic final, novak djokovic defeated world number one rafa nadal in a third set tiebreak to win the sony ericsson open 4-6 6-3 7-6 on sunday.
